inn1.comm: full in length, from round the stumps right away to Amla who pushes this to the on side
good delivery that landed on a good length outside off and kicked up even as it seamed away a bit. Smith was surprised by the extra bounce, ended up stabbing it to the off side
lovely probing delivery from round the stumps, lands on a good length and sort of holds its line, Amla was beaten, pushes inside the line
further away from the off stump and Amla, who normally likes going after these ones, shoulders arms
gets forward to drive down the track but Zaheer dives to make a half-stop
Shot! it was short in length outside off, Amla pressed his weight back in a flash and punched it sweetly through cover point
short in length, straightens on the middle stump and holds up a bit .. Smith tried to adjust to the lack of pace but couldn't and the ball hits him on the thigh pad
stays back to work this past square-leg for a single
oversteps the mark and free hit coming up. Its in the zone outside off, left alone
the slower one outside off, Amla had cleared the front foot and was setting himself for the slog across the line but is beaten by the lack of the pace. The ball moves through to Dhoni
in the corridor outside off stump, left alone
full in length, just outside off stump, Amla leans across to defend and gets an inside edge on to his pad
lands on a good length outside off and moves on towards Dhoni
stays behind the line to defend the good-length delivery to the on side
short in length, just outside off, run down to third man
leans forward to push it to the on side for a single
stays back to steer it to  backward point
stumbles forward and tries to drive on the up and through the off side but was in no position to make contact
extra bounce on this one, short in length and outside off, Smith was shaping for the steer and is surprised by the bounce .. the ball leaps over the blade
shuffles across and tries to work it to the on side but the ball stops on this slow pitch and he is too early with the shot. The ball rolls of the leading edge to the off
stays back to punch it to the off side
shuffles right across, gets outside the off stump but only manages to clip the ball from outside off to midwicket
stays behind to defend this one to the off side
again shuffles right across, ends outside off and Munaf pushes it outside off and Amla defends
short in length, slower, Amla mistimes the intended forcing shot to mid-off
short in length outside off, guided to backward point
full in length and outside off, left alone
stumbles forward to defend to the off side
Hello! full in length and in the zone outside off and Smith goes for the off drive but goes so much inside the line! The ball rushes past the edge
straightens from a good length outside off, Smith reaches out to push it to cover
beaten again! Smith had a torrid time against Zak in the previous game. It continues on. AGain, he is pretty clueless whether it will come in or straighten and is beaten, pushing inside the line
stays back to guide it to third man for a single
full in length, on the off stump line, steered to third man
tries to punch on the up but the ball comes on slowly again and he ends up mistiming it back to the bowler.
straightens after landing on a good length outside off, Amla defends towards gully
shuffles across towards off and clips a length delivery through midwicket
breaks free with a big shot. He charges down the track, gets outside leg and swat-pulls a short-of-length delivery through wide mid-on
Two in a row. Full in length and outside off stump, Amla wrists a lovely square punchy drive past backward point.
from over the stumps now. It straightens on the middle and off line, dabbed to midwicket
another one that straightens around the off stump line, Amla pushes outside the line and inside edges it to backward square-leg
Whack! he moves down the track, again gets outside the leg in the process, and drags this over mid-on
shuffles outside off this time and punches this past the bowler and Harbhajan moves to his left at mid-off to make the stop
slants away from Amla who lets it go
he went across the line and ended up dragging it from the middle stump line to deep backward square-leg
in the channel outside off, run down to third man
takes a single down to third man
pushes this to the off side
Neat! It was a full-length delivery outside off, Amla waited on the front foot to adjust to the slow pace and drives through extra cover
Edged between Dhoni and wide lone slip. It straightened outside off stump, Amla went for the square drive and edged it. Raina and Dhoni both look at the big gap between them
Thump! He went down on his knee and crashed this full delivery to the left of mid-off
length ball outside off, punched to mid-off by Smith
slow full toss just outside off, Smith can't get the placement right as he saunters down the track and crunches the ball to mid-off
Shot! short of length ball, on legstump, Amla had plenty of time to rock onto the back foot and hammer that to the midwicket boundary
sensibly nudges this one past square leg for a single, South Africa have got a move on after a quiet start
shortish ball just outside off, very close to Smith's body, he tries to run that down to third man but is cramped for room and nearly plays it onto his stumps
Smith's struggle continues, a full ball well outside off, Smith looks to shovel it towards midwicket, mistimes it badly and the ball dribbles towards mid-on
starts with an overpitched delivery just outside off, Amla responds with a caress past extra cover, sensational timing, this is more of the Amla of 2010
width on offer for Amla, who doesn't bother much with footwork as he dabs the ball down to third man
shortish ball from Nehra, sits up for Smith's favourite swipe towards midwicket, connects well but Yusuf dives to his left to cut that one off
length ball outside off, Amla again opens the face to run the ball to short third man, it's a shot he has used often today
short of length ball in the channel outside off, driven awkwardly by Smith towards cover
back of length again from Nehra, on middle and off, flatbatted with poor timing by Smith to mid-on
from round the stumps and turns it down the leg side. Wide
leans forward to drive it back down the track
leans forward to dab this to the on side
works this from the middle stump to Raina at midwicket
leans forward to drive to deepish mid-off for a single
turns away from Smith who is beaten, pushing inside the line
dabs this close to the on side for a single
Harbhajan takes a smart catch! Smith went down the track and flat batted it to right of mid-off where Harbhajan moved swiftly and lunged out to take a sharp catch
short in length and outside off, dabbed to backward point
slower off cutter, outside off, steered to third man
stays back, opens the bat-face to run this one down to third man
slower one, on the off stump line, tapped to the off side
length delivery slanting across, stabbed away to gully
gets forward to push it to mid-on
leans forward to work this wide of midwicket for a single
leans forward to defend to the on side
from round the stumps, shortish, pulled away to deep backward square-leg
turns on the pads, Amla turns it neatly down to fine-leg boundary. There was a short fine-leg in place and he glanced it well to the right of the fielder
again on the pads,from round the stumps, turned to backward square-leg for a single
full in length, on the off stump line, steered to backward point
full in length and down the leg side, wide
leans forward to defend this to the off
tries to cut this hard but mistimes it because the ball stops on him.. and the ball rolls to point
slow off cutter outside off, Amla tries to dab it to third man but can't get wood on leather
on the middle and leg, pushed to right of mid-on
full and well outside the off stump, the batsman chases it but can't reach
gets forward to work it with the turn to backward square-leg region
slip and backward short-leg in place and van Wyk dabs this behind square-leg
goes down the track and drives to covers
on the pads, worked through to deep midwicket for a single
lands it just outside off and its defended on the front foot
Hello Hello! Short and wide down the leg side! it landed outside leg, short and turned past Dhoni, Van Wyk tried to pull it away but couldn't connect
gets the line right this time, lands it outside off and the batsmen is beaten, trying to defend inside the line
from round the stumps, slow and outside off, Amla waits on the front foot and slashes it to third man boundary. Fifty for Amla His 12th ODI fifty
fuller and straighter, driven to left of long-off for couple of runs
goes back, waits for the ball to arrive and clips it behind square-leg.
on the middle stump line, slow, turned past square-leg
full and outside off stump, driven to Yusuf at sweeper cover
shorter and Van Wyk goes back and drags it from outside off to deep midwicket
slip and leg gully in place, Harbhajan is now bowling over the stumps. It's short and its been pulled away for a single
gets down the track and works it wide to the right of midwicket for a single
slightly short again, pulled away to deep midwicket
turns from outside off, stabbed towards square-leg
turns in from outside off, Van Wyk opens the bat-face and steers it to the right of Kohli at slip
spins in from outside off, dabbed to cover point for a single
drifts in from round the stumps, lands around off stump line and turns away. Amla is beaten, pushing inside the line and has a close look at the pitch
drops this shortish and Amla pulls it away to deep backward square-leg
lets this one turn away to Dhoni
from a slightly round-armish action this time, on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
fuller, driven down to long-off
on the off stump line, cut to deep point for a single
back round the stumps and Amla works it towards deep midwicket. Parthiv Patel is the fielder and Harbhajan isn't happy that he has given away two runs
quicker and angling away from the off, left alone
slower, on the middle, wristed past square-leg for a single. 100 up for SA. Loud cheers
leans forward to defend this flighted delivery, from round the stumps
full but down the leg side.
slightly short and Van Wyk does well to press back and cut it well to the left of backward point. Crunchy
gets forward to defend to the off
leans forward to drive to the off for a single
Gone! Yuvraj walks quietly towards his team-mates! It turned away from the off stump line and Van Wyk stabbed it low to the right of lone slip fielder Kohli, who swoops forward to pouch it
goes back to work it to midwicket for a single
gets forward to ping long-off for a single
stays back to punch it to sweeper cover
stays back to cut to cover
turns to the off stump line, pushed to the on side
slower, lands it outside off, goes down the track and pings long-on

What a poor judgement for the second run. Greed! It was a mis-timed pull shot, the ball rolled away towards short fine-leg region. The slip fielder turned and rushed back. For some reason, Amla decided to turn back for the second run and was never in the frame when Dhoni collected the throw and broke the stumps
stays back to cut this one to deep cover for couple of runs
stays back to push this to cov
leans forward to drive to long-off
moves down the track and drives to long-on

Spun and gone! It drifted in round the stumps, lands on the off and middle line, and turned away. AB lunged forward to defend.  Dhoni took the 'catch' and broke the stumps in a flash. Simon Taufel, the umpire at the bowler's end, gave it out. So I reckon there was an edge. Replays in: Snicko shows there was no edge but he is stumped! Given out caught, of course
moves down the track to dab it close on the on side for a single
skips down the track and drives to long-off
leans forward to push to the off
gets forward to work it to the on side
rushes down the track and drives it back to the bowler
floated from round the stumps, nudged to the on side
short and wide, Duminy reaches out to force it to right of Nehra at long-off

What is happening out there? Another poor judgement! It was pushed  towards square-leg and he rushed across for the non-existent run. Virat moved to his left, picked it up and fired a  hit at the striker's end. du Plessis had turned back but he couldn't get back in time
leans forward to work this to deep midwicket
gets forward to defend it back down the track
leans forward to tap it to the on side
cut away to right of sweeper cover where Yusuf makes a tumbling stop
gets across to drive to mid-off
presses well back to tap it to the on side
turns away after landing on a good length on the middle and off line, defended on the back foot
turns away, the ball stops, forced off the back foot , down to long-off
gets forward to nudge it to Kohli at leg gully
turns this to square-leg region for a single
flighted outside off stump line, full, Duminy flays it down to long-off
leans across to defend to the off but the ball turns and clips the inside edge and rolls away to the on side
stays back to nurdle this around the corner for a single
gets back to punch this to midwicket
presses right back to defend down the track
lunges forward to push this back to the bowler
stops on Botha who adjusts and stabs it to covers
fetches this from outside off and sweeps it hard to square-leg boundary.
gets well back to punch this to extra cover
leans forward to ping long-off
gets forward to defend to the on side
hangs back and punches it to mid-on
moves down the track, fetches it from outside off and drags it through the on side
turns away from the off stump, cut to Yusuf at sweeper cover
on the pads, nudged to square-leg
gets on the back foot to chop this behind the wicket on the off side
collects this from outside off and paddles it to fine-leg region
goes for another sweep but its too full and he ends up pushing this to midwicket
on the middle, punched to mid-on
full and around the off stump line, square driven to deep point
turns away from the off stump, Botha was shaping to play before he withdrew the bat away from the line of trouble
from round the stumps, flighted outside off on a good length, JPD reaches across to slice it over cover fielder
gets down the track and pushes this towards long-on; Rohit moves in from the deep to stop
flighted full just outside off, shoveled away towards long-on
from round the stumps, outside off ,defended on the front foot
on the back foot this time, and works this through midwicket
from over the stumps, extra bounce on this delivery turning in from outside off. BOtha shouldered arms and Dhoni made a half-stop as it jumped at an awkward height
opens the bat-face to guide it to third man
sprays to the pads and Botha unfurls the leg glance to perfection
short in length, slanted across Botha who pushes it back to Nehra
slower, fuller, around off, defended to covers
shortish, cut away to Yusuf at deep cover
short in length, on the leg stump line, swatted around the corner for a single
backs away to cut it to deep-point region
punches this back down the track and Raina lunges to his right to make the stop
full and on the middle, dabbed to man to the right of square-leg umpire
turns in from outside off, paddled down to fine-leg region
shorter, goes back to force it to right of Nehra at sweeper cover

Loud shout for lbw It landed on a good length just outside off and spun in to turn past the intended off drive and struck the pad in front of stumps. Was there an inside edge? Will confirm post replays. Raina and Dhoni screamed out a huge appeal. No edge and hawk eye says it would have hit the leg stump. Perhaps the ump felt that it would have turned down leg
stays back to defend to the on side
leans forward to defend to the on side
fullish, on the middle, JPD got the bat round the front pad just in time to drive it down the track and it hits the stumps at the other end.
short in length, forced away to sweeper cover
full in length, just outside off, driven to cover
runs this down to left of Harbhajan at third man for a single
short in length outside off, steered to right of third man
straightens on the off and middle, guided to backward point
Thump! Munaf tries the short ball and Duminy pulls it away in some style.
fuller and Duminy edges the off drive. The ball rushes past the off stump and Dhoni dives to his right to make a good stop
on a good length this time, steered to backward point
fullish, driven to Harbhajan at mid-off for a single
works this to third man for a single
on the pads, turned down to Harbhajan at fine-leg
from round the stumps now, on the leg and middle, tucked past square-leg for couple of runs that brings up the 50 partnership
well outside the off stump, from round the stumps, left alone
fullish, around off, pushed to the off
dabs this to square-leg for a single
full in length in the zone outside off, left alone
shortish, cut to wide third man for couple of runs
straightens outside off, defended on the back foot
fuller, on the off, pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
moves forward and across to drive on the up and Rohit dives to his right at covers
full in length and again driven to Rohit
Lovely timing! It was a full-length delivery on the middle from round the stumps, Botha leaned forward to whip it through wide midwicket
full and outside off stump this time, steered to point
gets forward to drive to left of mid-on where Yuvraj makes a diving stop to prevent a four
tries the short one and Duminy pulls it well to the right of Yusuf at deep midwicket
slower off cutter just outside off, run down to Munaf at third man
full from round the stumps, pushed towards mid-off for a quick single
flighted on a length around off, turned to backward square-leg
leans forward to work it to midwicket
slightly short in length, forced away to right of Nehra at sweeper cover
floated full, turned to midwicket
outside the off stump, Botha is beaten, trying to cut to point
on the middle stump line, dabbed past square-leg
on the off stump line, driven to wide  long-on

Stumped! floated outside the off stump line, Botha goes for the sweep, misses and also drags the back foot outside the crease. Dhoni, as ever, doesn't take his hands back after collecting. He collects and immediately moves his hands forward to break the stumps. He knew immediately that he had got his man. Third umpire confirms it
in the zone outside off stump, goes for the cut and is beaten
leans forward to dab it to the on side
on the middle and off line, nudged to the off side
drives to deep point for a single
full on the leg and middle line, from round the stumps, driven to long-off
tossed up on a length around off, driven to long-off again
on the middle stump line, pushed to covers
turns away from the off stump, pushed away to Raina at extra cover
on the off stump line, steered through point
goes back to punch it to long-on
from round the stumps, pushed to midwicket
backs away to cut to sweeper cover
leans forward to nudge it back to the bowler
moves down the track and pushes it well to the right of cover fielder for a single
on the off stump line, pushed to Munaf at backward point
on the off stump line, punched down to long-off
stays back to cut it to deep-point region
steers to short third man region for a single
on the off and middle, tapped to point
cut away to point for a single that brings up the 200
leans forward to squeeze this to short third man for a quick single
leans forward to defend to the on side
gets back to push it to the on side
stays back to punch it to mid-on
moves down the track and on drives to long-on
gets forward to ping long-off
And again
floated on the middle stump line, squeezed out to point
on the off stump line, driven to right of cover for a single
moves down the track and whips it to deep midwicket
slightly short in length ,cut away to deep point
on the middle stump line, guided to cover point
on the middle stump line, dabbed to the on side
gets back to cut it for a single
gets forward to drive it back to the bowler
slower, just outside off, cut to point
paddles it away for a single
gets forward to ping long-off
outside the off stump, goes for the square drive and gets a nice fat edge to third man boundary
tries to sweep it but doesn't connect properly
swats this one down to Nehra at fine-leg region
shortish delivery just outside off, flat-batted down to long-on
leans forward to push to the off side
fullish, outside off stump, jabbed out to the off
fullish, outside off, square driven to deep point
fullish outside off, square driven to point
full in length, just outside off, turned wide of midwicket .. to left of Dhoni
slower, outside off, guided to short third man
short in length, chopped to backward point
low dipping full toss around off, worked around through midwicket
gets forward to drive to left of mid-off for a single
just outside the off stump, run down to third man
around the off-stump line, pushed away to right of backward point
Top shot! He glided forward to caress the fullish delivery through extra cover. 50 up. Fab responsible knock, this.
low full toss, pushed to point
fires across a yorker, Robin tries to bring the bat down but the ball hits the boot and runs through vacant slips. Zaheer is not pleased; he reckons that it hit the boot and should be lbw ..
pushes this to extra cover
Thwack! Flighted full around off and Peterson crunches it through point. He went down on a knee and unfurled a lovely square drive

driven to Yusuf at extra cover and there is a terrible mix-up. Yusuf fires the throw to Harbhajan. Duminy had rushed across and Peterson wasn't interested but decides to get across. Harbhajan dislodges the bails by accident just as he was about to collect the throw. He then uprooted the stumps. Peterson sacrificed his wicket there
worked to short fine-leg region for a single
gets forward to drive it back to the bowler
parthiv does really well to take this wide delivery down the leg side. It was a quick one too and Patel lunged to his left
short in length outside off, cut away through point
low full toss from over the wicket, whipped to right of deep midwicket for couple of runs
full delivery on the middle stump line, stabbed out to the off
on the pads, turned past square-leg for couple of runs
SA move to 251 as Duminy jabs this good-length delivery to the off side
fullish outside off, driven to mid-off
really full delivery on the middle, pushed out to bowler
on the pads, turned to square-leg for a single
slower one, full in length on the middle, dragged to deep midwicket. The throw came in to Munaf who was pretty slow in dislodging the bails, and the batsman dived to get back inside the crease
rushes down the track, Munaf pushes it wide outside off, Duminy reaches out to tap it to right of cover fielder
full delivery on the middle, dragged through midwicket
Boom! Duminy clears the front foot and heaves the good-length delivery over midwicket boundary. A thumping pull of the front foot
crashes this hard but Virat intercepts it at mid-off
swing and  a miss. It was a slower one and Steyn went for the slog but missed. They rush across for a bye though

inn2.comm: leans forward to steer the good-length delivery to point
gets on that front foot again and pushes this to mid-off
fullish, around off, driven to right of mid-off for a single
in the corridor outside off, left alone
again in the channel outside off, left alone
gets forward and across to defend a good-length delivery
slants this across Rohit who chases it but doesn't get wood on leather
And again. Rohit gets on the front foot and then tries to go after this one but again fails to connect
Rohit fails. Again. It was yet another delivery that was slanted across him outside off and Rohit cuts it straight to backward point.
gets forward to defend it to the off
in the zone outside off, moving away, left alone
shifts his weight back to punch this to covers
fullish, around the off, driven to mid-off
in the zone outside off, dabbed to backward point
Top shot! Crunchy pull! It was the short delivery and he arched back to pull it superbly over square-leg
cuts away from Parthiv who pushes it to cover
full in length around off and Patel drives it sweetly but straight to mid-off
slightly slower, on the off, Parthiv gets forward to defend it towards covers
Virat leans forward and across to flay a good-length delivery outside off through extra cover. Neatly done
gets behind the line to defend this to covers. Lopsy bowled this from round the stumps
gets behind the line to play a compact-looking defensive push
Classy! It was full-pitched outside off and he glided across to caress it through extra cover.
gets forward to push this to mid-on
More runs. Virat gets forward and across and whips a full delivery, coming in from round the stumps, past square-leg
gets forward and across to punch the good-length delivery on the up to covers
full in length outside off, timed well but straight to cover fielder
full in length, lands on the middle, skids towards middle and off, squeezed out to point
gets on the front foot and drives to mid-off
short in length, angling away from Parthiv who steers it to backward point
Fuller in length outside off and Parthiv flayed it in the air but to the right and clear of the diving mid-off fielder
from over the wicket now,, jabbed out to the off side.
slower off cutter, Virat pushes it to covers
short in length outside off, cut away to backward point
full and outside off stump, Virat goes for the cover drive and edges it past the leg stump, and it races away to the fine-leg boundary
short in length outside off, run down to third man for couple of runs
in the zone outside off, angling across Virat, who tries to guide it to third man and is beaten
from round the stumps to Parthiv who rides the bounce and guides to backward point
kicks up outside off and Parthiv upper cuts it to third man. It's a shot that he plays often.
gets across, covers the off stump and lets this ball fly through to AB
in the corridor outside off, Virat shoulders arms
full in length outside off, Virat gets forward to defend it to the off
fuller in length, on the middle and Virat wrists it past square-leg for couple of runs
slower one outside off, tapped to right of backward point for a single
full in length, slower, on the middle, pushed down to mid-on
gets forward and across to defend to the off side
stays back to punch this to short extra cover
gets forward to drag this to mid-on
full in length around off and middle, eased to mid-on
works this to the square-leg region
lovely delivery from round the stumps. It moved away at the last instant and Parthiv sparred inside the line
good-length delivery on the off-stump line, pushed out to covers
short in length, tapped to right of backward point
short in length, again some extra bounce and Virat looks to defend and edges it past the leg stump
fuller in length, outside off, Virat edges the off drive towards mid-on and after some hesitation they rush across
slower off cutter outside off, pushed out to extra cover
works this wide of mid-on for a risky single .  Run out missed Amla missed the direct hit and had he found the stumps, Virat was a goner
steers this to Duminy at backward point

Trapped! Lonwabo takes out his second victim. It was a slightly slower one, landed full in length around off and moved in. Parthiv fell over a touch on that front foot and tried to waft across the line and missed. It would have taken out the leg stump
stays back to defend this good-length delivery to cover
jumps from just short of length, Yuvraj stabs it down in front of him
in the corridor outside off stump, Virat bottom-edges his cut and it falls short of AB
gets forward to defend to the off side
full in length, on the middle and off, Virat's bat-face shuts a bit and the ball rolls to square-leg
fullish, wristed away but straight to square-leg. Virat is not too pleased with himsef; he realises he missed out a four there
gets forward and across to drive the full-length delivery to mid-off
jumps from short of length outside off, swayed away
full in length, on the middle and off line, Yuvraj pushes it back to Steyn
gets back to push this out to covers
squeezes this to cover point and they rush across for the single
full delivery, eased to mid-on
slower one, Virat Kohli works this behind square-leg for a single
Wham. Yuvraj backs away and crashes this to the left of mid-on
turns in to the middle stump line, Virat gets back to work it through to deep midwicket
around the off stump, tapped to extra cover
drifts to the pads, worked down to fine-leg region
turns in to the middle stump, Virat pings deep midwicket fielder again
lovely delivery from wide of the crease round the stumps,. It drifted in, landed around the off stump and turned away from the outside edge
stretches forward to defend
reaches across outside off and hits it hard to sweeper cover
short in length  outside off and Yuvraj goes for the cut but the bat goes way below the ball
fuller, straighter, driven back to Morne, who throws it back down the track
beaten! in the zone outside off, full in length, from round the stumps, Yuvraj pushes inside the line as the ball straightens just outside off
on the off stump line, defended to the off
short in length outside off, Yuvraj shapes to cut but is again beaten by the extra bounce
on the middle stump line and Virat yet again turns Botha to deep midwicket
Flat six! Crash. He stretched forward, collected the ball from outside off and flayed it to the long-on boundary
around the leg stump line, moves past the defensive prod to hit the pad
this one comes in from the round the stumps angle and turns away from Yuvraj who holds his bat inside the line
full in length but Yuvraj is stuck to his crease, and is beaten as he looks to stab it to the off

Smith takes a lovely catch! Yuvraj went for the paddle sweep but didn't connect well. The ball lobbed towards leg gully. Smith rushed to his right from slips and the ball was dying on him but he dived full stretch to pouch it inches off the turf
backs away to mistime a cut to cover point for a single
stays back to push this to the on side
turns in from outside off and Raina edges the defensive poke to his pad
reaches out to push this to covers
leans forward to ease this back to the bowler
lunges forward and works this ball down to long-on
clears the front foot and dabs this off break to midwicket
moves forward and lunges out to defend to short extra cover
leans forward to push it towards mid-off region for a single
slower, on the off stump line, nudged to midwicket
quicker, spins in to the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
slower, Kohli goes for the cover drive but is beaten by the lack of pace and edges it to the on side
leans across to drive to Amla at deep point
leans forward to dab to midwicket
on the front foot, worked to wide of midwicket
leans forward to drive to long-off
the ball stops a touch on Raina who tries to check his drive and ends up punching it aerially but clear of the lunging midwicket fielder
moves down the track, lunges towards off and pushes it to covers
turns in quickly from outside off, worked to deep square-leg
leans well forward to defend to the off
full around off, eased down to long-off
stays back to punch this down to long-on
on the middle stump line, defended on the front foot
on the off and middle, pushed to extra cover
drifts on to the pads, Kohli gets back to unfurl the leg glance to fine-leg boundary
stretches well forward to drive the flighted delivery well to the right of Amla at sweeper cover
on the off stump line, pushed to covers for a single
gets back to clip it past square-leg

stretches forward to off drive and edges it to his pad. The ball rolls past the off stump and AB looks for a stumping chance and  tries to flick the ball to stumps but misses. Kohli had stretched out to play that shot. The back leg was in the air.
works this one to backward point
leans forward to dab this to the on side for a single
shout for lbw but it struck him just outside off. The ball spun in to move past the prod and bounded to vacant slip region
quicker one from round the stumps, cut to backward point
quickish, outside leg, turned behind square-leg
turns in to the off and middle line, punched out to cover
flighted full on a length outside off, on driven to long-on
slower, outside off, short in length, Virat Kohli was early through with his intended cut shot and failed to connect
gets forward to drive to long-off
gets down on his knee to lift it to the left of Tsotsobe at long-on
punches this to left of Kohli, the  bowler tried to lunge out to stop and they collided ..
short in length, turns away, cut to deep point
short in length and outside off, Virat forces it well to the right of sweeper cover where Morne van Wyk rushes across to make a fine diving stop
reaches forward to on drive to l ong-on
takes a couple of steps down the track and drives to duminy at short extra cover
cuts hits one out to Steyn at sweeper cover
on the off and middle line, dabbed to backward square-leg
a slight McGill-like action, tossed up on leg, not much turn there, Kohli gets forward to defend, is hit on the pads
flat, slightly short on middle, jabs it towards midwicket
low full toss on the off, pushed through to long-off for a single
short and wide, flat, rocks back and slaps it towards long-off for a single
short and going down the leg side, Raina tries to help it on its way fine, misses, called a wide
sweeps fine but doesn't get hold, came off the pads actually, just a single
pitched up this time, gets forward and drives it along the ground to long-on
turning it away, short of a good length, tries to cut it past point, misses
a welcome release for India, landed on a length and Kohli latched onto it, made some room and drove it hard over extra cover to find the gap
mistimes a drive back to the bowler
nicely done, a fifty under pressure for Kohli, his job is only half-done, driven down the ground for a single
slightly short on leg stump, turned towards short fine, a quick single taken
angling it on the pads, tickled towards deep backward square leg for one more
he's immediately dispatched, short ball on middle, a long hop, has plenty of time to rock back and smack it over midwicket
bowled full on middle, driven wide of midwicket for a single
Raina goes over the top now, was looking more towards extra cover but plays it towards long-off instead, a single in the end
pitched up outside off, strikes it hard through the line to long-off
fullish outside off, chips it inside out wide of extra cover for a single
fullish, drilled down the ground to long-off for one more, steady run-flow here
superbly timed, Kohli is stepping up here, tossed up by Peterson, Kohli came down the track while simultaneously giving himself some room and lofted it clean over long-off
quicker through the air, defended towards extra cover
takes it from a length and drives it down to long-off
slightly short outside off, dabs it into the off side, thinks of a single but it's not there

stumped, a wicket just when it appeared they were recovering well, it went on straight from Peterson, Raina took a couple of steps down the track,  it was short outside off,  was beaten in flight, then tried to play for the turn and dab to the off side but the ball didn't turn in as much as he hoped and de Villiers did a neat job behind the stumps, the pressure is back on now
slips it straight on middle and off, defended cautiously to extra cover
leans forward to block it
gets back to cut to sweeper cover
lovely delivery, seams away from short of length outside off, DHoni is beaten, pushing inside the line
gets back and across to push it to the off
full and in the corridor, left alone
sprays this down the leg side for a wide
gets back and across to steer this to third man
leans forward to drive to sweeper cover
Stunning hit! He stretched forward and crashed this high over long-off. Superbly done. He didn't moved down the track this time, just stretched that upper body forward
works this to the off for a single

Soft dismissal! It was a delivery outside off that stopped a touch on Dhoni who ended up checking his intended punch shot , and pushed the ball straight to short extra cover! Gone! He trudges back to the hut.
loud shout for lbw as the ball straightens on the middle stump line, Yusuf was looking to defend and he seems to have jammed on the ball at the same time as it hit the pad
tries to break free with the big shot but ends up dragging it through square-leg
full in length outside off, driven through the line and to the right of sweeper cover
gets back to guide this down to third man

Morne takes out Yusuf with a superb delivery. It was full in length just outside off and seamed away at the last instant. Yusuf stumbled forward, late, and had a poke at it. He was trying to waft it to the on side! Fatal. Edge and gone! Morne roars!
gets back to defend it back down the track
extra bounce outside off and Harbhajan stabs it wide of the slip fielder
pushes it wider outside off, left alone
leans forward to block it
gets back to cut it to sweeper cover
moves forward to drive to long-off
around the off stump line, defended on the front foot
turns away from the off stump, Harbhajan gets forward to push it quietly to the off
turns from the off stump line, fuller, Harbhajan squeezes it to point
stays back to punch it to mid-on
Swat-whack! It was a full delivery around the middle stump line and he dragged it with his bottom-hand through wide midwicket
stays back to clip it past square-leg
full in length, on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
pushes it to covers, wants a single but Harbhajan sends him back in time
around the off stump line, worked wide of midwicket
gets back to deflect it to midwicket
top edges the paddle sweep and they rush across for a quick single to short fine-leg
quicker, turned to Smith at short fine-leg
leans forward to defend it back to the bowler
on the middle and leg, wristed past square-leg region
